sorcery.name: Soul Arrow
sorcery.description: Elementary sorcery. Fire a soul arrow. Soul arrows inflict magic damage, making them effective against iron armor, tough scales, and other physically resilient materials

sorcery.name: Heavy Soul Arrow
sorcery.description: Elementary, yet practical sorcery from long ago. Fires a heavy soul arrow. Offers greater power but slower casting time, entailing a vulnerability that makes this sorcery trickier to handle.
